summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6667 for the improvement of S. Webster St. from 2nd Ave. S. to 4th Ave. S.; and from 5th Ave. S. to S. Riverside Drive; and certain other streets, avenues and an easement; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; and conducting preliminary right of way activities; under Ord. No. 105367, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
